title: Binance founder’s fate hangs in the balance amid legal turmoil
description: In a groundbreaking development, cryptocurrency exchange Binance has pleaded guilty to criminal charges and agreed to pay a staggering $4.3 billion in fines and penalties. Richard Jones, the federal judge overseeing the case, accepted the guilty plea late Friday, marking the largest settlement in the history of federal financial prosecutions. description: TLDR The crypto-verse is evolving, with new players venturing into the market each day. title: UK business registry approves controversial ERC20 wallet drainer
description: Crypto Grab, a developer known for creating phishing software, has officially registered as a business in the United Kingdom. As reported by blockchain security firm CertiK, this registration comes amid allegations that the company’s software, Nova Drainer, is used for illicit activities, specifically targeting cryptocurrency assets through phishing attacks. title: BitMEX Founder Predicts Explosive Bitcoin Surge: Two Catalysts to Unleash All-Time Highs
description: Arthur Hayes predicts Bitcoin could reach new highs due to spot ETFs accumulating BTC and potential Federal Reserve rate cuts. He also forecasts a significant rally for Ethereum with the possibility of a spot market ETF approval. title: Double Down on Bitcoin: Valkyrie Launches 2x Leveraged ETF
description: Not long after the launch of its Bitcoin Spot ETF, Valkyrie deviated from a 2x Leveraged ETF. The fund is specially designed to bridge the gap between the traditional market and the digital asset market. title: $30 Billion RIA Platform Offers Four Spot Bitcoin ETFs To Clients
description:
According to reports, Carson Group, a US-based registered investment advisor (RIA) with a $30 billion volume on its platform, has offered four spot Bitcoin ETFs for its clients. Out of the recently approved ETFs, the group gave a GreenLight to BlackRock’s iShares Bitcoin Trust, Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund, Bitwise Bitcoin ETF, and the Franklin […]
